CellInfo.description:
Additional information about a cell, which is relevant for documentation
    purposes

cell_name.description: A human readable name of the cell.
cell_name.title: Cell Name

uuid.description: A unique identifier assigned to this cell in this run.
uuid.title: Uuid

assembly_date.description: The date when the cell was made.
assembly_date.title: Assembly Date

batch.description: A batch number for the cells, if it is available.
batch.title: Batch

anode_info.description: The metadata related to the anode used in the cell.

cathode_info.description: The metadata related to the cathode used in the cell.

location.description: The location, where the physical cell can be found, which corresponds to this specification.

CellInfo.title: CellInfo

FormulationInfo.description:
Additional information about a formulation, which is relevant for documentation
    purposes

name.description: A human readable name of the formulation.
name.title: Name

uuid.description: A unique identifier assigned to this formulation in this run.
uuid.title: Uuid

preparation_date.description: The date when the formulation was prepared. For commercial formulations, the manufacturing date may be used.
preparation_date.title: Preparation Date

batch.description: A batch number for the formulation, if it is available.
batch.title: Batch

location.description: The location, where the physical formulation can be found, which corresponds to this specification.

FormulationInfo.title: FormulationInfo

Location.description:
The location providing information on where to find physical samples or
    equipment.

address.description: The physical address, where the objec can be found. Depending on the usecase, this may be an official address or a name of an instute or similar. The default should be an address.
address.title: Address

detail_1.description: A more detailed description of a location. This may be e.g. a specific laboratory in a building, a desk in an office or a device or a cabinet.
detail_1.title: Detail 1

detail_2.description: Another level of detail for a location. This may be e.g. a bench in the laboratory, a shelf in a cabinet  or a specific port in a machine.
detail_2.title: Detail 2

Location.title: Location

json_schema_specifications.description:
Parameters to be used with the following quantities:
    `Capacities`

cycling_protocoll.description: Name of a standardized testprotocoll(i.e BIG-MAP-Cycling).
cycling_protocoll.title: Cycling Protocoll

number_cycles.description: The number of cycles the test shoudl run through after formation.
number_cycles.title: Number Cycles

cell_info.description: Information about the cell provided by AutoBass.

location.description: Physical location where the cycler is.
location.title: Location

crate_charge_formation.description: C-rate of charging in formation process
crate_charge_formation.title: Crate Charge Formation

crate_discharge_formation.description: C-rate of discharging in formation process
crate_discharge_formation.title: Crate Discharge Formation

CV_Icutoff_formation.description: current cutoff value in A for the constant voltage step in formation process
CV_Icutoff_formation.title: Cv Icutoff Formation

cycling_Vmax.description: max. Voltage of battery during cycling in V
cycling_Vmax.title: Cycling Vmax

cycling_Vmin.description: min. Voltage of battery during cycling in V
cycling_Vmin.title: Cycling Vmin

CV_Icutoff.description: current cutoff value in A for the constant voltage step
CV_Icutoff.title: Cv Icutoff

json_schema_specifications.title: CapacityCyclingInput

json_schema_result_output.description: Result for the Capacities of each cycle.

capacity_list.description: A list with calculated capacities in Ah for charge and discharge alternately.
capacity_list.title: Capacity List

channel_list.description: A list with the channels used for cycling.
channel_list.title: Channel List

json_schema_result_output.title: CapacityCyclingOutput
